vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑπομνημᾰτογρά?~Xφ-ος
(paroxytone), ὁ, in plural, memoir-writers or historians (including τὰ τῶν Γαλιλαίων.. βιβλία), opposed to φιλόσοφοι, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__2 recorder, name of a great official in the Egyptian king's household, and the corresponding official in the office of the minister of finance (διοικητής), and probably in those of other high officials, [LXX+3rd c.BC+]; also of a lesser local official, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
